front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for New Generation Asymmetric Digital Subscriber Lines (NG-ADSL)

abstract.t: This document defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) module for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes objects used for managing parameters of "Asymmetric Digital Subscriber Line" family of interface types, especially including ADSL, ADSL2, and ADSL2+.
